title: Season Days Countdown is correct
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has logged into the system
custom_steps: WHEN they are viewing the banner at the top of the page
custom_expected:
THEN the banner will display correctly where we are in the season based on the Start of MJ League Season :
- X Days until Spring Training. 
- X Days until Opening Day. 
- Day X of Major League Championship Season.

title: BOC user receives notification when No teams entered for a No-Trade clause
custom_preconds: GIVEN an Approved MJ contract contains a No-Trade clause with a "Submit by" date on or before today's date that is missing teams
custom_steps:
WHEN the nightly notification batch runs 
AND finds a contract that meets the above criteria
custom_expected: THEN a notification will be sent to BOC MJC Admin

title: Club user receives notification when No teams entered for a No-Trade clause
custom_preconds: GIVEN an Approved MJ contract contains a No-Trade clause with a "Submit by" date on or before today's date that is missing teams
custom_steps:
WHEN the nightly notification batch runs 
AND finds a contract that meets the above criteria
custom_expected: THEN a notification will be sent to the player's Club MJC Admin

title: BOC user receives notification if decision is not made on Club Option
custom_preconds: GIVEN an Approved MJ Contract contains a Club option with a decision date on or before todays date and is missing a decision
custom_steps:
WHEN the nightly notification batch runs 
AND a contract is found to meet the above criteria
custom_expected: THEN a notification is sent to the BOC MJC Admin:  "A club decision is due on [date] for the [year] option year for [player name]. It is a [option type] option."

title: Club user receives notification if decision is not made on Club Option
custom_preconds: GIVEN an Approved MJ Contract contains a Club option with a decision date on or before todays date and is missing a decision
custom_steps:
WHEN the nightly notification batch runs 
AND a contract is found to meet the above criteria
custom_expected: THEN a notification is sent to the player's Club MJC Admin:  "A club decision is due on [date] for the [year] option year for [player name]. It is a [option type] option."

title: BOC user receives notification if decision is not made on Player Option
custom_preconds: GIVEN an Approved MJ Contract contains a Player option with a decision date on or before todays date and is missing a decision
custom_steps:
WHEN the nightly notification batch runs 
AND a contract is found to meet the above criteria
custom_expected: THEN a notification is sent to the BOC MJC Admin:  "A player decision is due on [date] for the [year] option year for [player name]. It is a [option type] option."

title: Club user receives notification if decision is not made on Player Option
custom_preconds: GIVEN an Approved MJ Contract contains a Player option with a decision date on or before todays date and is missing a decision
custom_steps:
WHEN the nightly notification batch runs 
AND a contract is found to meet the above criteria
custom_expected: THEN a notification is sent to the player's Club MJC Admin:  "A player decision is due on [date] for the [year] option year for [player name]. It is a [option type] option."

title: As a user I want to print the signing bonus of a Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions to view and print major league contracts
AND the user has navigated to a major league contract
AND the Print split button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Print on the MJC
custom_expected: THEN the "Signing Bonus section of the contract should be accurately reflected in the printed contract

title: As a user I want the system to indicate if a MJ Contract is a draft or not
custom_preconds: GIVEN a MJ Contract is in Preliminary, Terms Submitted or Terms Confirmed state
custom_steps: When printing/viewing the contract
custom_expected:
THEN
The pdf will have a "DRAFT" watermark on it.

title: As a user I want approving a contract to stamp the attached contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user created a MJ contract 
And attached the contract
custom_steps: When the Contract is moved to an Approved or Approved for next year state
custom_expected:
THEN
The system will add an approval stamp to the "Approvals" page of the attached contract. 
The system will need to determine what page of the uploaded pdf the Approvals page is on and stamp in the proper coordinates. 
The stamp will be same as EBIS1

title: Create MN Contract for an Employee
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing an Employee profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Create New Minor Contract
custom_expected:
THEN a Preliminary Minor Contract will load 
AND the MNC will be able to successfully create, submit, and approve the contract

custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks on the C.B. Tax Payroll- Team Details 
AND enters prompts
custom_expected: THEN the report will load with the entered prompts

title: As a user, I want to run the MJ Contract Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Report Listings widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on 'Major Contract' (printing the blank MJ Contract) from the widget
custom_expected: THEN user should be prompted to a new window to print Blank MJ Contract. Layout should match attached PDF in comment (Click Reference).

title: As a user I want to run the CBT Assessment Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Report Listings widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects 'Competitive Balance Tax Assessment' report from the widget 
AND enters desired prompts
custom_expected:
THEN the report will load with the entered prompts in separate tab. 

Requirements: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2340966

title: As a user I want to be able to duplicate a Covenant Clause
custom_preconds: GIVEN a MJ contract includes NO-Trade and/or Assignment Special Covenants
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the 'Duplicate the Clause' button
custom_expected: THEN the clause duplicates as-is

title: Add a "+" to the create new icon
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has logged into the system
custom_steps: WHEN they are viewing all the create new icon
custom_expected: A white '+' sign should be on the icon.

title: As a user I want to see a line for Options with a decision in the player's history
custom_preconds: GIVEN an Approved MJ contract contains option year(s)
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing Player History
custom_expected:
THEN
- Any Option year for which an "Approved" decision and a decision date have been entered, display in the Player History. 
- The date should = the decision date. 
- The code = Maj Cont
- The Description = (Option Type) Major League Option For (YYYY) - Decision: (Decision) 
- Ex: Club Major League Option for 2013 - Decision: Exercised*
- To/From Org columns are blank. 
- Clicking the line will take the user to the associated MJ Contract.

title: As a user I want to be able to see historical clauses on existing contracts
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract is created in EBIS1
custom_steps: WHEN user pulls up the existing contract in EBIS2.5 and view the complete details, including special covenants that do not exist in ebis2.5
custom_expected:
Then 
users will still be able to view the details of the existing contracts. However these historical covenants should NOT be available for use in new contracts on EBIS2.5.

* The covenants are: 
     - MLR 9(C) Provision
     - Club Will Not Offer Salary Arbitration
     - Personal Appearance
     - College Scholarship Plan
     - Incentive Bonus Plan
     - Drug Testing
     - Loan
     - Post-Playing Career Services
     - Addendum 1
     - Addendum 2
     - Addendum 3

title: As a user I want to be able to load an Employee Profile (Updates)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to view an Employee profile
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Employee name from the roster
custom_expected:
THEN
-Employee profile should load
-Employee profile header should show: 
     * Name on first row, just like players
     * Second row:‰Ûâ‰Ûâ 
-Level can be one of the following: 
Major League
Minor League
AAA
AA
1A
1F
SA
RA
R
VSL
DSL
-The proper Org logo should also be reflected in the Employee's Profile

title: As a user I want 403 errors to be a blocking message instead of a red notification
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user does not have permission to view a module on the system
custom_steps:
WHEN user is clicks on the module that they don't have permission to view
 Ex: - Log in as admin-cws-all/paperriver804 
       - Click batches under utilities
custom_expected:
THEN
-A blocking message should return the user to the attempted point of entry - not leaving them on a blank page.
-Message title should be "Error" and the body should read 'You do not have permission to view this item'.
-Both 'X' and 'Back' on the message should take the user back

title: As a BOC admin I want to running the MJC Stat Batch to generate notifications
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is viewing the batch parameters widget on the MJC stat batch screen 
AND has selected 'update' from mode dropdown
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks 'run'
custom_expected:
THEN
-A notification will be generated for any clause that is updated. 
-If a performance bonus is marked earned, Notification #2 will be generated for the BOC MJC Admin and the Club MJC Admin that the player is currently signed with. 
-If a salary escalator with a performance criteria is marked earned, Notification #4 will be generated for the BOC MJC Admin and the Club MJC Admin that the player is currently signed with. 
-If an Option with a performance criteria is marked earned, Notification #5 will be generated for the BOC MJC Admin and the Club MJC Admin that the player is currently signed with.

title: As a user I want to see "X Days After World Series" in the Option clause
custom_preconds: GIVEN an MJ contract contains option year(s)
custom_steps: WHEN printing the contract view the option clause
custom_expected: Club Decision Date column header stay the same, but is populated as "5 Days After World Series" for example, instead of using a date.

title: As a user I want to receive a notification on screen if I am not using a supported browser
custom_steps: WHEN user tries go to EBIS2.5 on Black listed browsers(IE & OPERA)
custom_expected:
THEN 
user receives a notification on screen; Title: Your browser may not be fully supported. Body: For a better experience please use the latest version of Chrome or Firefox.
